subject: Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: The game may have lacked offensive art, but it had plenty of drama and defense as No. 1 L.S.U. survived stretches of inconsistent play to escape with an overtime victory over Alabama.
snippet: The game may have lacked offensive art, but it had plenty of drama and defense as No. 1 L.S.U. survived stretches of inconsistent play to escape with an overtime victory over Alabama.
